content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the panevėžys district court the court decided to award an apartment to one party and a volvo xc90 vehicle to the other party the court determined that the apartment should be assigned to the claimant without compensation to the defendant while the volvo xc90 was recognized as the personal property of the defendant the text discusses various articles from the civil code related to property rights and matrimonial property the application was lodged by the applicant who explained that they are married to the defendant and have two minor children they have been living separately since 2009 and now wish to dissolve the marriage due to irreconcilable differences the court will consider the evidence and make a decision on the dissolution of the marriage property division and child maintenance the property acquired during the marriage an apartment and a vehicle will be divided between the parties
